deconz.form.associate: Associate. Open web browser and go to phoscon web app (check URL above). Set a master password if needed and then go to Menu, Gateway, Advanced and click on Authenticate app. Tick this box and save the association should be done.
deconz.form.scan: Enable scan lights, sensors or switches for 60 seconds
deconz.message.new.light: A new light has been added, protocol is : %@
deconz.message.new.sensor: A new switch / sensor %@ has been added, id : %@
